text: R4.6. Average Disk Access Time The average seek time for a disk is 18 ms. The disk rotates at 7200 RPM and there are 512 sectors per track. What is the average access time to read one sector, in ms? Give you answer to 2 decimal places. number (rtol=0.0001, atol=0.0051) -] Save & Grade Single attempt Additional attempts available with new variants @
